Button labels:
Default start of the program: Ok-Button:
init Button labels:
In case creation of a NEW record, the ADMNO comes from this table
(instead of getting it out of DEBC)
Control change Handler!:
Check, if there exists a debtor at all:
In order to show DEBH_HADR_NAME1, the unique DEBC_NO
has to be found (done in the control change handler of v.DEBC_DEBC)
Default behaviour for ESC:
Anything changed but not saved?
Check for existence will be done in the link,
if it succeeds, the check for 1 or more records and also the
presentation of the selection will be done by UFB551
if no record was found, delete debtor:
Validations: Don't do any in Query Mode:
Client is mandatory:
Client not found in client administration:
Unknown client:
Debtor is mandatory:
Unknown debtor:
Amount is mandatory:
Currency is mandatory:
Unknown currency:
Reason code is mandatory:
Unknown reason code:
So, no errors occured => save record:
:End: Skip all validations in Query mode
How to proceed after having handled the record:
If a NEW record was created, then restart with empty screen for next new record:
but if a record was just queried or modified=>go back to overview table:
:End: How to proceed after having handled the record
Type cannot be changed=> Init for creation is enough, no update needed:
If a new record is saved, then a new TDEL_NO has to be created:
Init or modify fields:
